name: Wojciech Plandowski
content: W.Rytter Wojciech Rytter Professor at Institute of Informatics, Department of Math/Inf. Warsaw University, Warsaw , Poland e-mail: rytter@mimuw.edu.pl Address: Department of Mathematics, Warsaw University ul. Banacha 2, 02-097 Warszawa, Poland Very short CV another photo (40+ years earlier) The book is available here Additional 25 problems + solutions available for free here See also WWW page of the book The book Text algorithms, available for free here Research interests: analysis and construction of efficient sequential and parallel algorithms, automata theory, complexity of recognition and parsing of context-free languages, pattern matching, algorithmics of WWW, parallel combinatorial computing, graph-theoretic algorithms, algorithmics of highly compressible objects BOOKS 200 problems on automata, languages, computations Cambridge University Press 2023 (coeditors: Filip Murlak, Damian Niwinski) 125 Problems   in   Text Algorithms Cambridge University Press, 2021 (coauthors: M.Crochemore, T. Lecroq) see WWW page of the book Jewels of Stringology World Scientific, 2002 (coauthor: M.Crochemore) Fast parallel algorithms for matching problems in graphs Oxford University Press 1998 (coauthor: Marek Karpinski ) see contents Text algorithms Oxford University Press 1994   (coauthor: M. Crochemore) see contents and incomplete list of errors Efficient Parallel Algorithms Cambridge University Press 1988, (co-author: A.Gibbons). Analysis of Algorithms and Data Structures , Addison Wesley, 1991, (co-authors: L.Banachowski A.Kreczmar). Algorytmy i struktury danych Wydawnictwo Naukowe PWN 2018 (in Polish) (coauthors: L. Banachowski, K. Diks) DBLP list of my publications Other (old) links Moodle
